Column.Name: Criteria Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Criterion name cannot be empty - provide a name to the criterion or remove the criterion" )

Column.Name: Question IDs
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Require at least 1 question to assess the criterion" )

Column.Name: All Question IDs
Column.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("Unique Reference", "RecordID", "Question", "Question Value", "Question Valid"), "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Status] <> 'Deleted'", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "sort", "[RecordID] ASC") );
RETURN ARRAY_TO_HASH_GROUPED( $data, $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEX($item, 1), $(i, item) HASH( "RecordID", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 2), "Question", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 3), "Point Value", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 4), "Question Valid", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 5) ) )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Type] = "Mandatory Requirements", ARRAY("Yes", "No"),
ARRAY("Example Option 1", "Example Option 2") )

Button.Text: Find criteria sets using this criteria

Binding.Expression: AND( [Set Detection Triggered] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Found in Criteria Set], "RecordID") <> NULL )

Label.Text: Criteria not used in any criteria sets

Binding.Expression: AND( [Set Detection Triggered] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Found in Criteria Set], "RecordID") = NULL )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Remove entry from any linked sets

Label.Text:
This will delete the criteria, it will be automatically removed from all criteria sets where it is listed.
DO NOT use this if you are only trying to remove this from a single set. To remove a criteria from a criteria set you can do the removal from the criteria set screen.
